doc:
Defines the various types of load balancing modes supported by the connection pool ion the batch-module.

This is only relevant if you have multiple mail servers in one or more clusters. Currently it is impossible to define different load balancing strategies for different clusters.

enumConstants.name: ROUND_ROBIN
enumConstants.doc: Fixed sequence, looping through all available connection pools in a cluster.

enumConstants.name: RANDOM_ACCESS
enumConstants.doc: Randomly choose a connection pool (server) to request a connection ({@link javax.mail.Transport}) object from.
